Posts.Content: Jun 27, 2018 08:53PM Starbuckc wrote: great news! I had my biopsy yesterday as well. But they scheduled me an appointment for next Tuesday to discuss results. I asked if someone could call me if they came in sooner, and they said nope. It's going to be a long week
Posts.Title: 27, recently found lump, awaiting biopsy procedure and scared biscuitsmom19 Starbuckc

Posts.Content: Jun 28, 2018 11:46AM Starbuckc wrote: the waiting is tough! But my husband and I decided to have an impromptu yard sale this weekend to try and distract us both. So I'm keeping pretty busy rushing around the house gathering up our junk, erhm I mean treasures. I'd say 90% of the time, I'm fine and completely sure everything is fine, then there are the times when my stomach drops and I think "what if it's not". My husband is one stoic dude, so it's been hard to see him worried, so I have to keep pulling up studies on how Birads 4a's are over biopsied and most of the time could be downgraded to a watch and see status. Which is reassuring
Posts.Title: 27, recently found lump, awaiting biopsy procedure and scared biscuitsmom19 Starbuckc
